item.title: Lecture 4: Sequence alignment I
item.description: WarmUp with Python Numbers Open this notebook Make a copy of it in your drive Go through it and execute all cells Mapping versus alignment One possible idea on how to speed things up will be to first find most likely locations for each read and them refine alignments as necessary. In other words reads should be mapped by identifying regions of the genomes from which they most likely originate.
